title: Andy Venture and the Big Blob of Slime
description: When one of Andy Venture's lab experiments goes horribly wrong, a giant slime creature is created that threatens the entire city...and its citizens. Andy must use his brilliant mind and incredible inventions to stop his own creation before it's too late. Can this forth grader figure out a way to save the people of his city from certain destruction? Or will the big blob of slime take over?
author: Collin Berry
